description: This file defines a React Native component 'NoteEditor' used for creating and editing notes within a note-taking mobile application. It manages note state, interacts with a database, and provides UI elements for note input and saving.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React component for editing or creating a note, handling note state, fetching existing note data if editing, and saving the note.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Handles the save action, including validation and calling the appropriate database method to save or update the note.
